curam.core.impl

Class DataBaseSearchExtractor

  • java.lang.Object
    • curam.core.base.DataBaseSearchExtractor
      • curam.core.impl.DataBaseSearchExtractor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    curam.core.intf.DataBaseSearchExtractor

    public class DataBaseSearchExtractor
extends curam.core.base.DataBaseSearchExtractor
    Extracts the relevant Search Service information from the Curam DB and populates the relevant Search Staging DB data structures with this information.

      • extract

        public final void extract(SearchServiceKey serviceKey)
                   throws AppException,
                          InformationalException
        This is a batch operation. It is used to extract Curam database search service related entities and populates the Search Staging database for the specified search service. If the identifying search service key is empty then all search service data will be extracted.
        Parameters:
        serviceKey - the search service key Struct for identification.
        Throws:
        AppException - Generic Exception Signature
        InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Convenience main method allowing the modeled batch method.
        Parameters:
        args - Generic main signature.
        See Also:
        to be executed from the development environment as if it were the main method of a java application.

        public static void setKeyHandler(curam.gss.batch.impl.KeyHandler keyHandler)
        Sets the callback handler for the extractor readmulti operation.
        Parameters:
        keyHandler - The new handler to use.
